scripts.clean:all: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/haste-map-* && rm -fr node_modules && rm -fr package-lock.json && rm -fr yarn.lock && yarn && cd ios && rm -fr Pods/ && rm -fr Podfile.lock && pod install
scripts.start:ios: rm -fr ios/build && cd ios && rm -fr Podfile.lock && rm -fr Pods/ && pod install && cd ../ && react-native run-ios
scripts.start:android: rm -fr android/app/build && cd android/ && ./gradlew clean && cd ../ && react-native run-android
scripts.codepush:push:ios:Staging: code-push release-react $npm_package_codepush_app_name_ios ios --t $npm_package_version --dev false --d Staging --des $npm_package_codepush_des --m false
scripts.codepush:push:android:Staging: code-push release-react $npm_package_codepush_app_name_android android --t $npm_package_version --dev false --d Staging --des $npm_package_codepush_des --m false
scripts.codepush:push:ios:Staging:m: code-push release-react $npm_package_codepush_app_name_ios ios --t $npm_package_version --dev false --d Staging --des $npm_package_codepush_des --m true
scripts.codepush:push:android:Staging:m: code-push release-react $npm_package_codepush_app_name_android android --t $npm_package_version --dev false --d Staging --des $npm_package_codepush_des --m true
scripts.codepush:push:all:Staging: npm run codepush:push:ios:Staging && npm run codepush:push:android:Staging
scripts.codepush:clear:all:Staging: npm run codepush:clear:ios:Staging && npm run codepush:clear:android:Staging
scripts.codepush:push:all:Staging:m: npm run codepush:push:ios:Staging:m && npm run codepush:push:android:Staging:m
scripts.codepush:push:ios:Production: code-push release-react $npm_package_codepush_app_name_ios ios --t $npm_package_version --dev false --d Production --des $npm_package_codepush_des --m false
scripts.codepush:push:android:Production: code-push release-react $npm_package_codepush_app_name_android android --t $npm_package_version --dev false --d Production --des $npm_package_codepush_des --m false
scripts.codepush:push:ios:Production:m: code-push release-react $npm_package_codepush_app_name_ios ios --t $npm_package_version --dev false --d Production --des $npm_package_codepush_des --m true
scripts.codepush:push:android:Production:m: code-push release-react $npm_package_codepush_app_name_android android --t $npm_package_version --dev false --d Production --des $npm_package_codepush_des --m true
scripts.codepush:push:all:Production: npm run codepush:push:ios:Production && npm run codepush:push:android:Production
scripts.codepush:clear:all:Production: npm run codepush:clear:ios:Production && npm run codepush:clear:android:Production
scripts.codepush:push:all:Production:m: npm run codepush:push:ios:Production:m && npm run codepush:push:android:Production:m
